sect1.para: Below is the list of patches applicable to the NetBSD 2.0 release:

itemizedlist.listitem:
A description and resolution procedure for Local DoS via audio device with specific drivers can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-002

A description and resolution procedure for Crypto leaks across HyperThreaded CPUs (i386, P4, HTT+SMP only) can be found in
NetBSD Security Advisory NetBSD-SA2005-001
